resources.string: The dictionary entries in this software are derived from JMdict and KANJIDIC2 projects from EDRDG. www.edrdg.org\n\nThe Kanji strokes diagram are the work of Ulrich Apel and team in KanjiVG. kanjivg.tagaini.net
This application needs 80 MB of spaces in your device\'s internal memory to store dictionary files. Please provide the required amount of spaces and try again.
